properties.address: Bar Hill/Vicarage Lane, Madeley, Crewe
properties.description: Our church is open every Wednesday morning for a friendly welcome with free refreshments. Our warm space runs alongside our foodbank. We also have a children's corner and small toy library. All are welcome.
properties.title: All Saints Church

properties.address: Alsager Library, Cheshire ST7 2QH
properties.description: A local library offering a range of services and open to all. Located near shops and amenities.
properties.title: Alsager Library

properties.address: 38 Piccadilly Street,, Stoke On Trent, Staffordshire ST1 1EG
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 20th January 2025** This space is available to the community for those in need of emotional support, physical assistance, and guidance .
properties.title: Appolo Community Hub

properties.address: Bentilee Volunteers, Staffordshire ST2 0DH
properties.description: A group for mental wellbeing that do crafts and upcycling of furniture. Hot drinks are served and a hot meal is available for a cost of £3.
properties.title: Bentilee Volunteers

properties.address: Biddulph Town Council, Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire ST8 6AR
properties.description: For the second year, Biddulph Town Council and partners are working to offer warm friendly spaces and free food opportunities, creating a network of places where Biddulph people can come together to try new things and seek support or advice. The timetable below shows what’s available in the town: https://www.biddulph.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/FINAL-Biddulph-Comes-Together-A3-Leaflet-29-Nov-2023.pdf All groups offer a friendly welcome, with safeguarding policies and food hygiene rules in place. There are also many volunteering opportunities available, and all groups would welcome your support. Volunteering can help you learn new skills, meet new people, gain confidence, build relationships and make a difference. Biddulph Town Hall is a warm space; you are very welcome to join us to stay warm and have a cup of tea.
properties.title: Biddulph Spaces

properties.address: 4 Woodberry Close, Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire ST4 5LU
properties.description: Our Community HQ is a welcomming, non-judgmental, and safe space for everyone, regardless of age, abilities or background.
properties.title: Community HQ

properties.address: Temple Street Methodist Church & Community Centre, Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire ST4 4NW
properties.description: Every Tuesday we have a Community Meal serving a 2 course hot dinner followed by dessert and every Thursday we have a Community Cafe offering free tea, free coffee, and free toast.
properties.title: Community Meal & Community Cafe

properties.address: Crewe Library, Cheshire CW1 2BB
properties.description: Large public library open to all. Offers a range of services. Located in the town centre, within the Crewe Lifestyle Centre.
properties.title: Crewe Library

properties.address: Smithpool Road, Stoke, Stoke ST4 4PB
properties.description: A warm community space with welcoming and caring team open to all
properties.title: Fenton Nazarene

properties.address: Cornerstone community centre Silverdale, Newcastle-under-lyme, Staffordshire ST5 6PF
properties.description: Join us for free food giveaways, free toast and drink, free bingo and free soup. Everyone’s welcome, Everyone is very welcome
properties.title: Free Fridays

properties.address: Kidsgrove Labour Club, Staffordshire ST7 4AB
properties.description: The space is open to all. We have a shop, crafts, free food and a hot drink and chat corner.
properties.title: Kidsgrove Rotary Food Hub

properties.address: Hanley centre, hanley, Staffordshire st1 3jp
properties.description: We have a cafe which is very reasonable and on a Wednesday we have a community lounge which can help if you are struggling with any costs or need advise to or who to speak with regarding food banks.
properties.title: Mrs. Helen Podmore

properties.address: 35 Stafford Avenue, Staffordshire ST5 3BN
properties.description: Open to all for warmth, friendship and optional activities such as quizzes and games. Free refreshments.
properties.title: Newcastle Baptist Church

properties.address: Grace Church, Staffordshire ST1 4AF
properties.description: Open House is a drop-in for anyone wanting a space to enjoy other people’s company, play games and enjoy free refreshments, including tea, coffee, cold drinks, biscuits, and soup & bread. People are able to charge their phones and access toilets while with us. They are also able to access free clothes, sleeping bags, rucksacks, socks, gloves, and hats if they are experiencing homelessness.
properties.title: Open House

properties.address: 131 Longton Hall Road, Stoke on Trent, Staffordshire ST3 2EL
properties.description: Every Wednesday you can join us from 10.30am for ‘Open House’ which is a social time with tea, coffee and cake/biscuits. At 12.15pm ‘Chair Exercise’ takes place, this is a seated exercise session run by Stoke City Community Trust. Both sessions are FREE, refreshments are FREE and we even offer FREE WiFi. All sessions are in the main church building. You can join us for one or both sessions. Everyone is welcome!
properties.title: Open House & Seated Exercise

properties.address: Temple Street Methodist Church, Staffordshire ST4 4NW
properties.description: Every Thursday morning between 9.30am to 12 noon, our Place of Welcome Community Cafe is open offering free hot and cold drinks and free toast. We also have a Free Food event every Thursday providing bread and fruit & veg in partnership with Tesco and FareShare.
properties.title: Place of Welcome Community Cafe

properties.address: The D J School Association, Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire ST3 1HT
properties.description: The space is situated in a community centre and is accessible for all. Small art gallery in the cafe area free to sit or read or take part in any of the free activities taken place. We offer free or very affordable meals.
properties.title: Scouse's Cafe @ U7 Arts and Cultural centre

properties.address: St Michael and All Angels Church,, Newcastle-under-Lyme, Staffordshire ST5 9LJ
properties.description: Church hall with kitchen, toilets, and disabled access and toilet.
properties.title: St Michael and All Angels Church

properties.address: St Pauls Road, Newcastle-under-Lyme, ST5 2PQ
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 21st November 2024** Open to all Aspire Housing customers over the of 55 year, to find our more about their warm spaces visit https://www.aspirehousing.co.uk/warm-spaces
properties.title: St Pauls Road

properties.address: The Hub, Staffordshire ST6 6QR
properties.description: The space is open to all on a Tuesday morning between 9.30 and 12 noon (with a low cost hot meal afterwards). We are open at other times during the week for people to drop in for advice, support and a quick brew.
properties.title: The Hub@ST6

properties.address: Unit 23 Bennett Precinct, Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire ST3 2HT
properties.description: Located in the heart of Longton town centre, our community library is entirely volunteer-led, offering a welcoming warm space for everyone. On the ground floor, you'll find a book exchange, a piano, and a variety of musical instruments, as well as food and drink making facilities. There's also a small children's play zone, comfortable rest areas with tables and chairs, and fully accessible toilets with baby changing facilities. Upstairs, we offer professional ping pong tables, a small kitchen area, and accessible toilets for added convenience.
properties.title: The Little Longton Book Exchange

properties.address: The Terrace, Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire ST4 5DG
properties.description: Coffee Social lounge space inside The Terrace Inn Pub. Warm space with warm drink available to everyone of all ages and abilities
properties.title: The Owen Project Coffee Social

properties.address: Trentham Community Learning Centre, Trentham,, Stoke-on-Trent ST4 8PQ
properties.description: Community library offering book lending, craft sessions and other activities . Tea, coffee and biscuits available. Visitors are encouraged to stay and chat.
